title: Anyone know whats going on with PBE and how to sign up?
body: hey guys, just wanted to know what was going on with PBE, and if i will ever be able to sign up, knowing im a bronze player, i dont have as much ezperience with the game as others, ive only been playing for a year or two now but ive been wanting to get my hands on a PBE account the moment i found out about it, to test new patches before they come out on the live server to adjust myself.

replies.body: The signups for PBE are still closed for maintenance. The devs are working on making the entire process from start to finish a bit easier and quicker for everyone involved, and you can stay updated on their progress by checking the [**status page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).
thx for the info, but when the pbe is finished what will the chances of my account request being accepted be?
